She used her on-campus address.
Instead of a voter-registration card, she got a packet of information from the local registrar with a slew of questions to figure out whether she was really a resident or not.
The questionnaire asked whether she owned or leased property in Norfolk.
It asked whether she intended to make Norfolk her home.
It asked whether she was listed as a dependent on her parents' income-tax forms.
